version_description:
Introducing Penman with new features:
* Speech to Text
* Notebooks
* iCloud Sync
* Powerful Text Editor

!! -- Urgent Bug Fix -- !!
- Dear users and subscribers We are deeply sorry for the crashes that happened after purchasing premium all those crashes and many more are gone now!
- Various improvements to Text Editor

** We encourage everyone to update, to this version **
What's New:
- 3 Day trial before purchasing premium
- Improved Speech to Text
- Various bug fixes
- iPad optimizations
- RTL - LTR support in the text editor

* Speech to text bug Fixed
* You can now add text anywhere in your notes with Speech to Text
* Minor bug Fixes
* Reduced app size by 30mb

What's new:
* You can now resize images - just tap the image and select Resize
* You can now delete images too just by tapping and selecting Delete
* Various bug fixes

What's new in this version :
* Themes : Check out the new cool dark theme
* Fixed speech to text bug in cases text would not appear
* We have tried to restore lost notes in cases they deleted unexpectedly
- Added a new dark theme for both free and premium users :)

# Critical Update for all Users:
In this version we have implemented a very much requested feature:
- Big Change in our Speech to Text platform: Speech recognition will no longer stop if you pause while speaking.
- You can test Speech to text free for a limited time without subscribing.
* Added a new theme : Midnight Orange

Penman 2.0 is the biggest update we’ve ever released, taking advantage of iOS13s new capabilities:
#1. Dark Mode, Penman now supports ios13 dark mode to provide you with an intuitive interface in correlation with ios.
#2. Submenus, Press and hold any note or notebook to see the new Submenu feature.
#3. Apple Pencil, You can now unleash your creativity with Apple Pencil and annotate your notes.
#4. Search, You can now search your notes and notebooks right from the homepage.
#5. Bugs we’re removed and we polished up the iPad version.
